body_html:
@danieleghisi you can run bazel in the tensorflow root directory
bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops. But, the ops files generated stay in the bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops

bazel build cc_ops don't work because of some relative path in the BUILD file.

eg.

git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops
body_text:
@danieleghisi you can run bazel in the tensorflow root directory
bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops. But, the ops files generated stay in the bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops
bazel build cc_ops don't work because of some relative path in the BUILD file.
eg.
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops
body:
@danieleghisi you can run bazel in the tensorflow root directory
`bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops`. But, the ops files generated stay in the `bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/cc/ops`

`bazel build cc_ops` don't work because of some relative path in the BUILD file.

eg.

```
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
bazel build tensorflow/cc:cc_ops
```
